subject: Re: [LH] Kate Bush -- Bad Neighbor! (more details)
body:
In article ,
 yellowmatter@gmail.com (yellowmattercustard) wrote:

> Donny Bravo wrote:
> 
> >> And what have you done to decrease your carbon footprint?
> 
> 
> > When the celebrities and politicians who claim to care passionately 
> > about the issue get down to my level, I'll consider taking them 
> > seriously.
> 
> Just as I thought. Nothing!

I'll tell you what I've done to reduce my carbon footprint--no kids. 
That's a savings that has huge implications as time goes on.

> Everyone wants to keep passing the buck, and play the blame game.

Hey, I'm not buying into the Global Warming Hoax. But, that doesn't stop 
me from ridiculing the hypocrisy of celebrities who do.

If you want to blame someone/thing for global warming, check out the sun 
and cyclical warming/cooling cycles. We were in a cooling period from 
the 1950s to the 1970s, even while our carbon dioxide production was 
skyrocketing--imagine that.

> Great.
> 
> I wonder, have any of the lh's made a concerted effort to reduce their 
> carbon footprint?

Not too many, I'd guess. All of these Global Warming Alarmists want 
someone else to do all the savings, or they want to get off easy by 
buying the bogus global warming offsets, which are clearly a joke.

- Donny
